markdownRemark.html:
GUI 프로그래밍을 배웠다. 프로젝트할 때 활용을 하기 위함인 듯 싶다. pytorch의 auto grad를 배웠고, 지난주에 학습 data의 10%의 data로 tensorflow hub에 있는 ResNet을 활용해 학습을 해보았다.

13일차

GUI 프로그래밍

  • 001_popups.ipynb

GUI : Graphic UserInterface

  1. Tkinter (파이썬 기본 라이브러리)
  2. PyQt (가장 이쁘다! 그런데 라이센스가 개인이 사용할 때는 문제가 없으나, 상업적으로는 구매를 해야 한다.

cf. https://riverbankcomputing.com/software/pyqt/
3. Kivy (모바일쪽 GUI 구현)
4. wxPython
cf. https://www.wxpython.org/
5. PySimpleGUI cf. https://github.com/PySimpleGUI/PySimpleGUI

!pip install pysimplegui

import PySimpleGUI as sg
print(sg.__version__) # 4.47.0

sg.popup("안녕하세요!")

for i in range(10):
    sg.popup_animated(
        sg.DEFAULT_BASE64_LOADING_GIF,
        no_titlebar=False,
        background_color="white",
        time_between_frames=100
    )
sg.popup_animated(None)
sg.popup_annoying("안녕하세요!")
sg.popup_auto_close("안녕하세요!")
sg.popup_cancel("안녕하세요")
sg.popup_error("안녕하세요")
sg.popup_no_border("안녕하세요!")
sg.popup_no_buttons("안녕하세요!\nPySimpleGUI")
sg.popup_no_frame("안녕하세요!\nPySimpleGUI")
sg.popup_no_titlebar("안녕하세요!\nPySimpleGUI")
sg.popup_ok_cancel("안녕하세요!\nPySimpleGUI")
sg.popup_scrolled("안녕하세요!\nPySimpleGUI" * 50) # 50줄
sg.popup_timed("안녕하세요!\nPySimpleGUI", auto_close_duration=5)
sg.popup_yes_no("안녕하세요!\nPySimpleGUI")
mydate = sg.popup_get_date() # 달력에서 찍어 온 날짜 값 반환
type(mydate), mydate
# (tuple, (9, 4, 2021))

sg.popup_get_file("파일을 선택해 주세요")
# 'C:/workspace/20210904/mytext.txt'

sg.popup_get_folder("폴더를 선택해 주세요")
# 'C:/workspace/20210904/venv_20210904'

sg.popup_get_text("무엇인가를 입력해 주세요")
'오늘은 GUI 프로그래밍'
sg.popup("안녕하세요 1", "안녕하세요 2", "안녕하세요 3", "안녕하세요 4")
sg.popup("안녕하세요", button_color=("black", "yellow"))
sg.popup("안녕하세요", button_color=("black", "yellow"), text_color="red")
sg.popup("안녕하세요", background_color="blue")
sg.popup("안녕하세요", background_color="yellow", text_color="red")
sg.popup("안녕하세요", icon = "./construction.ico")
sg.popup("안녕하세요", image = "./instagram.png")
sg.popup(image = "./instagram.png")
sg.popup_no_buttons(image = "./instagram.png")
sg.popup("안녕하세요", location=(500, 500))
sg.popup("안녕하세요", grab_anywhere=False)
  • 002_elements.ipynb
## button

import PySimpleGUI as sg

layout= [
    [sg.Button("버튼",size=(10,2))]
]
window = sg.Window("버튼들", layout)
event, values = window.read()
window.close()
print(event, values)
layout= [
    [sg.Button("버튼",size=(10,2))],
    [sg.Btn("단축버튼", size = (10, 3), button_color=("blue", "green"))]
]
window = sg.Window("버튼들", layout)
event, values = window.read()
window.close()
print(event, values)
layout= [
    [sg.Button("버튼",size=(10,2))],
    [sg.Btn("단축버튼", size = (10, 3), button_color=("blue", "green"))],
    [sg.B("완전 단축 버튼")],
    [sg.Ok(), sg.Cancel()],
    [sg.Yes(), sg.No()]
]
window = sg.Window("버튼들", layout)
event, values = window.read()
window.close()
print(event, values)
## ButtonMenu
menu = [
    "Menu",
    ["File", "Edit", "View", ["List", "Details", "Full"]]
]
layout = [
    [sg.ButtonMenu("Menu", menu_def = menu)]
]
window = sg.Window("메뉴", layout)

event, values = window.read()
window.close()
print(event, values)

=> 계층적 구조를 띈다.

## Canvas

layout = [
    [sg.Canvas(size = (100, 100), background_color = "blue",  key = "canvas")],
    [sg.Ok(), sg.Cancel()]
]
window = sg.Window("버튼들", layout)
event, values = window.read()
window.close()
print(event, values)
layout = [
    [sg.Canvas(size = (100, 100), background_color="blue", key="canvas")],
    [sg.Ok(), sg.Cancel()]
]
window = sg.Window("버튼들", layout)
window.finalize()
canvas = window["canvas"]
cir = canvas.TKCanvas.create_oval(50, 50, 100, 100)
event, values = window.read()
window.close()
print(event, values)

=> canvas에 circle이 생긴다.

## checkbox

layout = [
    [sg.Checkbox("체크박스", key="-CHECK1-")],
    [sg.CBox("단축 체크박스", key="-CHECK2-")],
    [sg.CB("더 단축 체크박스")],
    [sg.Ok(), sg.Cancel()]
]
window = sg.Window("버튼들", layout)
event, values = window.read()
window.close()
print(event, values)
## Column

col1 = [
    [sg.Checkbox("왼쪽 체크박스1", key = "-CHECK1L-")],
    [sg.CBox("왼쪽 체크박스2", key = "-CHECK2L-")],
    [sg.CB("왼쪽 체크박스3")],
]
col2 = [
    [sg.Checkbox("오른쪽 체크박스1", key = "-CHECK1R-")],
    [sg.CBox("오른쪽 체크박스2", key = "-CHECK2R-")],
    [sg.CB("오른쪽 체크박스3")],
]

layout = [
    [sg.Column(col1), sg.VerticalSeparator(), sg.Column(col2)],
    [sg.Ok(), sg.Cancel()]
]

window = sg.Window("컬럼들", layout)

event, values = window.read()
window.close()
print(event, values)
## ComboBox

data = list("abcdefg")
data # ['a', 'b', 'c', 'd', 'e', 'f', 'g']

layout = [
    [sg.Combo(values = data, size = (5, 4), default_value = data[0])],
    [sg.Ok(), sg.Cancel()]
]

window = sg.Window("ComboBox", layout)

event, values = window.read()
window.close()
print(event, values)
## Frame

data = list("abcdefg")
data # ['a', 'b', 'c', 'd', 'e', 'f', 'g']

frame = [
    [sg.Combo(values = data, size = (5, 4), default_value = data[0])],
    [sg.CB("왼쪽 Combobox"), sg.CB("오른쪽 Combobox")]
]
layout = [
    [sg.Frame("새로 만든 Frame", frame)],
    [sg.Ok(), sg.Cancel()]
]
window = sg.Window("combobox", layout)
event, values = window.read()
window.close()
print(event, values)
# Ok {0: 'c', 1: False, 2: True}
## Image

layout = [
    [sg.Image("./Instagram.png")],
    [sg.Ok(), sg.Cancel()]
]
window = sg.Window("이미지보기", layout)
event, values = window.read()
window.close()
print(event, values)

## Input
layout = [
    [sg.Text("입력 1")],
    [sg.Input(key = "-IN-")],
    [sg.Text("입력 2"), sg.In(key = "-IN2-")],
    [sg.Text("입력 3"), sg.I(key = "-IN3-")],
    [sg.Ok(), sg.Cancel()]
]
window = sg.Window("Input", layout)
event, values = window.read()
window.close()
print(event, values)
## ListBox

data = list("abcdefg")
data

layout = [
    [sg.Listbox(values = data, size = (5, 4))],
    [sg.Ok(), sg.Cancel()]
]

window = sg.Window("ListBox", layout)
event, values = window.read()
window.close()
print(event, values)
## Menu
menu = [
    ["&File",["!&Open","&Save","---","&Exit"]],
    ["&Edit",["Copy","Paste"]]
]
layout = [
    [sg.Menu(menu)],
    [sg.Ok(), sg.Cancel()]
]
window = sg.Window("Menu", layout)
event, values = window.read()
window.close()
print(event, values)
## Multiline
layout = [
    [sg.Multiline(size=(100,20))],
    [sg.Ok(), sg.Cancel()]
]
window = sg.Window("Multiline", layout)
event, values = window.read()
window.close()
print(event, values)
## Output Element
layout = [
    [sg.Output(size = (100, 20))],
    [sg.Ok(), sg.Cancel()]
]
window = sg.Window("Output", layout)
event, values = window.read()
if event == "Ok":
    for i in range(50):
        print(i)
window.close()
print(event, values)
## Progress
layout = [
    [sg.ProgressBar(max_value = 500, orientation="h", size=(20, 20), key = '-PROG-')],
    [sg.Ok(), sg.Cancel()]
]
window = sg.Window("Progress", layout)

for i in range(500):
    event, values = window.read(timeout = 1)
    if event == "Cancel" or event == sg.WIN_CLOSED:
        break
    window["-PROG-"].UpdateBar(i + 1)
window.close()
## Radio Button
col1 = [
    [sg.Radio("Radio-1", group_id = 1)],
    [sg.Radio("Radio-2", group_id = 1)],
    [sg.Radio("Radio-3", group_id = 1)],
]
col2 = [
    [sg.Radio("Radio-4", group_id = 2)],
    [sg.Radio("Radio-5", group_id = 2)],
    [sg.Radio("Radio-6", group_id = 3)],
]
layout = [
    [sg.Column(col1), sg.VerticalSeparator(), sg.Col(col2)],
    [sg.Ok(), sg.Cancel()]
]
window = sg.Window("Radio Button", layout)
event, values = window.read()
window.close()
print(event, values)
## slide
layout = [
    [sg.Slider(range = (1, 100), default_value = 50, orientation = "v")],
    [sg.Slider(range = (1, 200), default_value = 100, orientation = "h")],
    [sg.Ok(), sg.Cancel()]
]
window = sg.Window("Slider", layout)
event, values = window.read()
window.close()
print(event, values)
## Spin
layout = [
    [sg.Spin(initial_value = 3, values=list(range(1, 10)), size = (5, 5))],
    [sg.Spin(initial_value = "다", values=["가", "나", "다"], size = (5, 5))],
    [sg.Ok(), sg.Cancel()]
]
window = sg.Window("Spin", layout)
event, values = window.read()
window.close()
print(event, values)

## Status Bar
layout = [
    [sg.Multiline(size = (50, 10))],
    [sg.StatusBar("안녕하세요!")],
    [sg.Ok(), sg.Cancel()]
]
window = sg.Window("Status Bar", layout)
event, values = window.read()
window.close()
print(event, values)

## Tabs
tab1 = [
    [sg.Text("탭 1 내용")],
    [sg.I(size = (30, 1))],
    [sg.Text("이름")],
    [sg.I(size = (30, 1))],
    [sg.Text("주소")],
    [sg.I(size = (30, 1))]
]
tab2 = [
    [sg.Text("탭 2 내용")],
    [sg.I(size = (30, 1))],
    [sg.Text("학교")],
    [sg.I(size = (30, 1))]
]
layout = [
    [sg.TabGroup([
        [sg.Tab("탭 1", tab1), sg.Tab("탭 2", tab2)]
    ])],
    [sg.Ok(), sg.Cancel()]
]
window = sg.Window("탭들", layout)
event, values = window.read()
window.close()
print(event, values)
## Tables
data = []
for i in range(1, 11):
    row = []
    for j in range(1, 11):
        row.append(i*j)
    data.append(list(row))
data
heading = [f"Col-{i}" for i in range(1, 11)]
heading

layout = [
    [sg.Table(headings = heading, values = data)],
    [sg.Ok(), sg.Cancel()]
]
window = sg.Window("Table", layout)
event, values = window.read()
window.close()
print(event, values)

  • 003_window.ipynb
import PySimpleGUI as sg

layout = [
    []
]
window = sg.Window("안녕하세요", layout, size = (3200, 200))
event, values = window.read()
layout = [
    [sg.T("입력을 해주세요")],
    [sg.I()],
    [sg.Ok(), sg.Cancel()]
]
window = sg.Window("입력을 처리하는 창", layout)
event, values = window.read()
window.close()
print(event, values, type(event), type(values))
# Ok {0: 'zxcvzxv'} <class 'str'> <class 'dict'>
layout = [
    [sg.T("입력을 해주세요")],
    [sg.I(key="-INPUT-")],
    [sg.Ok(), sg.Cancel()]
]

window = sg.Window("입력을 처리하는 창", layout)
event, values = window.read(close=True)
print(event, values, type(event), type(values))

## window.close() 사용하지 않고, close=True 사용
layout = [
    [sg.T("입력을 해주세요")],
    [sg.I(key="-INPUT-")],
    [sg.Ok(), sg.Cancel()]
]
window = sg.Window("입력을 처리하는 창", layout)
event, values = window.read(close=True)
print(event, values, type(event), type(values))
layout = [
    [sg.T("입력을 해주세요")],
    [sg.I(key="-INPUT-")],
    [sg.Ok(), sg.Cancel()]
]
window = sg.Window("입력을 처리하는 창", layout)
while True:
    event ,values = window.read()
    if event == "Cancel" or event == sg.WIN_CLOSED:
        break
    print(event, values)
window.close()
print(event, values)
# Ok {'-INPUT-': 'abc'}
# Ok {'-INPUT-': 'abcdef'}
# Ok {'-INPUT-': 'zxcv'}
# Ok {'-INPUT-': 'zxcv'}
# Ok {'-INPUT-': 'zxcv'}
# Cancel {'-INPUT-': 'zxcv'}
layout = [
    [sg.T("입력을 해주세요")],
    [sg.I(key="-INPUT1-")],
    [sg.I(key="-INPUT2-")],
    [sg.I(key="-INPUT3-")],
    [sg.Ok(), sg.Cancel()]
]
window = sg.Window("입력을 처리하는 창", layout)
while True:
    event ,values = window.read()
    if event == "Cancel" or event == sg.WIN_CLOSED:
        break
    print(event, values)
window.close()
print(event, values)
# Ok {'-INPUT1-': '11', '-INPUT2-': '2233', '-INPUT3-': 'ASDF'}
# Ok {'-INPUT1-': 'zx', '-INPUT2-': 'cv', '-INPUT3-': 'ASDFdd'}
# Cancel {'-INPUT1-': 'zx', '-INPUT2-': 'cv', '-INPUT3-': 'ASDFdd'}
layout = [
    [sg.T("입력을 해주세요")],
    [sg.I(key="-INPUT-")],
    [sg.I(size=(20,1),key="-OUTPUT-")],
    [sg.Ok(), sg.Cancel()]
]
window = sg.Window("입력을 처리하는 창", layout)
while True:
    event ,values = window.read()
    if event == "Cancel" or event == sg.WIN_CLOSED:
        break
    window["-OUTPUT-"].update(values["-INPUT-"])
    print(event, values)
window.close()
print(event, values)
# Ok {'-INPUT-': 'asdf', '-OUTPUT-': ''}
# Ok {'-INPUT-': 'zxcv', '-OUTPUT-': 'asdf'}
# Cancel {'-INPUT-': 'zxcv', '-OUTPUT-': 'zxcv'}
# 입력값을 바로 보여주는 enable_events : 특정 element에 이벤트가 발생하면 바로 동작
layout = [
    [sg.T("입력을 해주세요")],
    [sg.I(key="-INPUT-", enable_events =True)],
    [sg.I(size=(20,1),key="-OUTPUT-")],
    [sg.Ok(), sg.Cancel()]
]
window = sg.Window("입력을 처리하는 창", layout)
while True:
    event ,values = window.read()
    if event == "Cancel" or event == sg.WIN_CLOSED:
        break
    if event == "-INPUT-":
        window["-OUTPUT-"].update(values["-INPUT-"])
    if event == "Ok":
        sg.Popup("Ok를 클릭하셨군요.")
    print(event, values)
window.close()
print(event, values)
# -INPUT- {'-INPUT-': 'a', '-OUTPUT-': ''}
# -INPUT- {'-INPUT-': 'ab', '-OUTPUT-': 'a'}
# -INPUT- {'-INPUT-': 'abc', '-OUTPUT-': 'ab'}
# -INPUT- {'-INPUT-': 'abcd', '-OUTPUT-': 'abc'}
# -INPUT- {'-INPUT-': 'abcde', '-OUTPUT-': 'abcd'}
# -INPUT- {'-INPUT-': 'abcdef', '-OUTPUT-': 'abcde'}
# Ok {'-INPUT-': 'abcdef', '-OUTPUT-': 'abcdef'}
# -INPUT- {'-INPUT-': 'abcdef', '-OUTPUT-': 'abcdef'}
# Ok {'-INPUT-': 'abcdef', '-OUTPUT-': 'abcdef'}
# Cancel {'-INPUT-': 'abcdef', '-OUTPUT-': 'abcdef'}
## theme
sg.theme_list()
# ['Black',
#  'BlueMono',
#  'BluePurple',
#  'BrightColors',
#  'BrownBlue',
#  'Dark',
#  'Dark2',
#  'DarkAmber',

# show more (open the raw output data in a text editor) ...
#

#  'Topanga']
sg.theme("DarkTeal") # 'DarkTeal'

layout = [
    [sg.T("입력을 해주세요")],
    [sg.I(key="-INPUT-", enable_events =True)],
    [sg.I(size=(20,1),key="-OUTPUT-")],
    [sg.Ok(), sg.Cancel()]
]
window = sg.Window("입력을 처리하는 창", layout)
while True:
    event ,values = window.read()
    if event == "Cancel" or event == sg.WIN_CLOSED:
        break
    if event == "-INPUT-":
        window["-OUTPUT-"].update(values["-INPUT-"])
    if event == "Ok":
        sg.Popup("Ok를 클릭하셨군요.")
    print(event, values)
window.close()
print(event, values)
  • 004_layout.ipynb
import PySimpleGUI as sg

layout = [
    [sg.T("Task-1"), sg.I(key = "-IN1-")],
    [sg.T("Task-2"), sg.I(key = "-IN2-")],
    [sg.T("Task-3"), sg.I(key = "-IN3-")],
    [sg.T("Task-4"), sg.I(key = "-IN4-")],
    [sg.T("Task-5"), sg.I(key = "-IN5-")],
    [sg.T("Task-6"), sg.I(key = "-IN6-")],
    [sg.Ok(), sg.Cancel()]
]
window = sg.Window("Tasks", layout)
event, values = window.read()
window.close()
print(event, values)
# Ok {'-IN1-': 'a', '-IN2-': 'b', '-IN3-': 'c', '-IN4-': 'd', '-IN5-': 'e', '-IN6-': 'f'}
layout = []
for i in range(1, 7):
    layout += [sg.T(f"Task-{i}"), sg.I(key=f"-IN{i}-")],
layout += [[sg.Ok(), sg.Cancel()]]
window = sg.Window("Tasks", layout)
event, values = window.read()
window.close()
print(event, values)
# Ok {'-IN1-': 'aa', '-IN2-': 'nn', '-IN3-': 'dd', '-IN4-': 'ee', '-IN5-': 'ff', '-IN6-': 'gg'}
layout = [ [sg.T(f"Task-{i}"), sg.I(key=f"-IN{i}-")] for i in range(1, 7) ]
layout += [[sg.Ok(), sg.Cancel()]]
window = sg.Window("Tasks", layout)
event, values = window.read()
window.close()
print(event, values)
# Ok {'-IN1-': 'asdf', '-IN2-': 'zcv', '-IN3-': 'df', '-IN4-': 'df', '-IN5-': 'dg', '-IN6-': 'h'}
def create_row(idx, vals):
    return [
        sg.T(f"Item-{idx}", size = (8, 1)),
        sg.Combo(values=vals, default_value=vals[0], size=(3, 1)),
        sg.I(key=f"-IN{idx}-")
    ]

values = list("ABCDEF")
layout = [create_row(i, values) for i in range(11)]
layout += [[sg.Ok(), sg.Cancel()]]    

window = sg.Window("Tasks", layout)
event, values = window.read()
window.close()
print(event, values)

]
window = sg.Window("Tasks", layout)

    [sg.T("입력해 주세요!"), sg.I(key="-IN-") ],
    [sg.T(key = "-OUT-", size = (20, 1)), sg.CB(text = "숨긴 값들",  key="-CMB-", visible=False)],
    [sg.Ok(), sg.Cancel()]
]
window = sg.Window("Tasks", layout)
while True:
    event, values = window.read()
    if event in ["Cancel", sg.WIN_CLOSED]:
        break
    elif event == "Ok":
        window["-OUT-"].update(values["-IN-"])
        window["-CMB-"].update(visible = True)
        window["-CMB-"].update(text = "유지됨")
    print(event, values)
window.close()
print(event, values)

## Dynamic Layout
layout = [
    [sg.T("입력해 주세요!"), sg.I(key="-IN-") ],
    [sg.I(key = "-FILE-", size = (40, 1), enable_events = True), sg.FileBrowse()],
    [sg.Ok(), sg.Cancel()]
]
window = sg.Window("Tasks", layout)

files = []
while True:
    event, values = window.read()
    if event in ["Cancel", sg.WIN_CLOSED]:
        break
    elif event == "-FILE-":
        fname = values["-FILE-"]
        if fname not in files:
            files.append(fname)
        layout = [
            [sg.T("파일을 선택해 주세요")],
            [sg.I(key="-FILE-", size=(40, 1), enable_events=True), sg.FileBrowse()]
        ]
        layout += [
            [sg.T(f, size=(30, 1), key=f"-TX-{idx}"),
            sg.T("x", key=f"-DEL-{idx}", enable_events = True)]
            for idx, f in enumerate(files)
        ]
        layout += [
            [sg.Ok(), sg.Cancel()]
        ]
        window1 = sg.Window("Tasks1", layout)
        window.close()
        window = window1
    elif event.startswith("-DEL-"):
        idx = int(event.split("-DEL-")[-1])
        print(idx)
        del files[idx]  

    print(event, values)
window.close()
print(event, values)

autograd in pytorch

  • 003_autograd.ipynb
! pip3 install torch torchvision torchaudio
import torch
x = torch.tensor([-1.2365, 1.8245, -1.0701, 0.0869, -0.0376])
x,type(x) # (tensor([-1.2365,  1.8245, -1.0701,  0.0869, -0.0376]), torch.Tensor)
loss = x**2 - 5
loss # tensor([-3.4711, -1.6712, -3.8549, -4.9924, -4.9986])

loss.grad_fn # none
x = torch.tensor([-1.2365, 1.8245, -1.0701, 0.0869, -0.0376], requires_grad = True)
x, type(x)
loss = x**2 -5
loss # tensor([-3.4711, -1.6712, -3.8549, -4.9924, -4.9986], grad_fn=<SubBackward0>)
loss.grad_fn # <SubBackward0 at 0x15b69af6430>
torch.ones(5) # tensor([1., 1., 1., 1., 1.])
loss.backward(gradient=torch.ones(5))
x.grad # tensor([-2.4730,  3.6490, -2.1402,  0.1738, -0.0752])

=> loss가 x**2-5이므로, loss의 dx인 x에 2를 곱한 값이 x.grad가 된다.

y = torch.tensor([4, 9, 16, 25])    
y.grad
y = torch.tensor([4., 9., 16., 25.], requires_grad = True)
y.grad
2 * x # tensor([-2.4730,  3.6490, -2.1402,  0.1738, -0.0752], grad_fn=<MulBackward0>)
a = torch.rand(2, 2, requires_grad = True)
a
# tensor([[0.2533, 0.7774],
#         [0.4435, 0.5372]], requires_grad=True)
a.requires_grad # True
b = a.detach()
b.requires_grad # False
c = torch.rand(2, 2, requires_grad = True)
c
# tensor([[0.3077, 0.7932],
#         [0.5114, 0.0407]], requires_grad=True)
with torch.no_grad():
    loss = c ** 2
    print(loss)
    print(loss.requires_grad)
# tensor([[0.2787, 0.8735],
#         [0.4128, 0.7446]])
# False

from tensorflow.keras.preprocessing.image import ImageDataGenerator

IMAGE_SHAPE = (224, 224)
BATCH_SIZE = 32

train_dir = "10_food_classes_10_percent/train/"
test_dir = "10_food_classes_10_percent/test/"

train_datagenerator = ImageDataGenerator(rescale = 1./255)
valid_datagenerator = ImageDataGenerator(rescale = 1./255)

train_data_10_percent = train_datagenerator.flow_from_directory(
    train_dir,
    batch_size = BATCH_SIZE,
    target_size = IMAGE_SHAPE,
    class_mode = "categorical"
)

test_data = valid_datagenerator.flow_from_directory(
    test_dir,
    batch_size = BATCH_SIZE,
    target_size = IMAGE_SHAPE,
    class_mode = "categorical"
)
# Found 750 images belonging to 10 classes.
# Found 2500 images belonging to 10 classes.

callback

## Callback
## tensorflow로 모델을 학습하거나 싱핼할 때 해당 모델에 특별한 기능을 추가하는 방법
## 인기있는 callback 함수
## 1) TensorBoard로 모델을 학습하는 내용을 추적
## 2) Model Checkpoint : 학습하면서 모델을 저장
## 3) Early stopping : 무의미하게 학습을 시키지 않는다. 개선이 없다면 학습을 중지
import tensorflow as tf
import datetime

def create_tensorboard_callback(dir_name, experiment_name):
    log_dir = dir_name + "/" + experiment_name + "/" + datetime.datetime.now().strftime("%Y%m%d-%H%M%S")
    tensorboard_callback = tf.keras.callbacks.TensorBoard(
                            log_dir = log_dir
                            )
    print(f"TensorBoard 로그 파일은 {log_dir}에 저장되었습니다.")
    return tensorboard_callback
tensorflow hub

https://www.tensorflow.org/hub/

!pip install tensorflow_hub
import tensorflow_hub as hub
from tensorflow.keras import layers

resnet_url = "https://tfhub.dev/google/imagenet/resnet_v2_50/feature_vector/5"

feature_extractor_layer = hub.KerasLayer(
                            resnet_url,
                            trainable = False,
                            name = "feature_extraction_layer",
                            input_shape = IMAGE_SHAPE + (3, )
                        )
resnet_model = tf.keras.Sequential([
    feature_extractor_layer,
    layers.Dense(train_data_10_percent.num_classes, activation = "Softmax", name = "output_layer")
])                  

resnet_model.compile(
    loss = "categorical_crossentropy",
    optimizer = tf.keras.optimizers.Adam(),
    metrics = ["Accuracy"]
)

resnet_history = resnet_model.fit(
    train_data_10_percent,
    epochs = 5,
    validation_data = test_data,
    callbacks = [create_tensorboard_callback(
                    dir_name = "tensorflow_hub",
                    experiment_name = "resnet50V2"
                )]
)
# TensorBoard 로그 파일은 tensorflow_hub/resnet50V2/20210904-164344에 저장되었습니다.
# Epoch 1/5
# 24/24 [==============================] - 237s 10s/step - loss: 1.8293 - Accuracy: 0.3947 - val_loss: 1.1470 - val_Accuracy: 0.6396
# Epoch 2/5
# 24/24 [==============================] - 237s 10s/step - loss: 0.8829 - Accuracy: 0.7427 - val_loss: 0.8428 - val_Accuracy: 0.7280
# Epoch 3/5
# 24/24 [==============================] - 210s 9s/step - loss: 0.6260 - Accuracy: 0.8213 - val_loss: 0.7573 - val_Accuracy: 0.7524
# Epoch 4/5
# 24/24 [==============================] - 206s 9s/step - loss: 0.4736 - Accuracy: 0.8747 - val_loss: 0.7053 - val_Accuracy: 0.7700
# Epoch 5/5
# 24/24 [==============================] - 204s 9s/step - loss: 0.3729 - Accuracy: 0.9213 - val_loss: 0.6753 - val_Accuracy: 0.7800

resnet_model.summary()  
# Model: "sequential_2"
# _________________________________________________________________
# Layer (type)                 Output Shape              Param #   
# =================================================================
# feature_extraction_layer (Ke (None, 2048)              23564800  
# _________________________________________________________________
# output_layer (Dense)         (None, 10)                20490     
# =================================================================
# Total params: 23,585,290
# Trainable params: 20,490
# Non-trainable params: 23,564,800
# _________________________________________________________________    
import matplotlib.pyplot as plt

def plot_loss_curves(history):
    loss = history.history["loss"]
    val_loss = history.history["val_loss"]

    accuracy = history.history["Accuracy"]
    val_accuracy = history.history["val_Accuracy"]

    epochs = range(len(history.history["loss"]))

    plt.plot(epochs, loss, label="traning_loss")
    plt.plot(epochs, val_loss, label="val_loss")
    plt.title("Loss")
    plt.xlabel("Epochs")
    plt.legend()

    plt.figure()
    plt.plot(epochs, accuracy, label="traning_accuracy")
    plt.plot(epochs, val_accuracy, label="val_val_accuracy")
    plt.title("Accuracy")
    plt.xlabel("Epochs")
    plt.legend()

plot_loss_curves(resnet_history)
